attributes.action: Demand to impose sanctions on the president and government of Ukraine
attributes.additional_details: Demand to impose sanctions on the president and government of Ukraine in the form of frozen all personal bank accounts in Europe in connection with the anti-terrorist operation against the civilian population of Donetsk and Lugansk regions, as well as apply a package of sanctions in case of continuation of ATO in respect of the high command of Ukraine cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine,in the form of a travel ban to the EU.
